Articles.Content:
Hello all, I discovered KSP about a week ago, and haven't been able to put it down since I've learned a lot from these boards and watching Youtube (especially Scott Manley's vids) - they really sped me along the learning curve here. I'm in the process of setting up a permanent Mun base and have gotten a probe to Minmus, can't wait to see the rest of the Kerbol system.

Enjoy some screens I've taken along the way.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Welcome! And for only a week or so in thats truly impressive!

Welcome to the forums!

Indeed, that's quite impressive for only having the game for one week.
Welcome! You'll have a good time here.

Hi,

That's what I call a nice start, indeed.

I can't even imagine what you will be up to, when you will start using mods ^^

Welcome.
One day I will figure this all out!

You'll find there is a LOT you can do in KSP. I even made a simple computer using some complex docking arrays. Anyhow, good luck, and if you're looking for good mods, might I suggest the Kerbal Attachment System? On the brightest side: You're capable of making orbit and more! Congrats on that, many users need extensive help with it.
